file.title: Background image

p.text: It is a background image of the first part of Double page.

p.textAll: You can set this image by specifying the path to a file of a image.

remarks.text: The path can be absolute, i.e. it begins from the letter of the drive
and relative. In this case the path begins from the folder where the project locates.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how Double panel background image can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Double panel1.Background image1 = "C:/1.bmp" Window1.Double panel1.Background image1 = "/1.bmp" Window1.Double panel1.Background image1 = My documents & "/2.jpg" Window1.Double panel1.Background image1 = Window1.Кнопка1.Background image
